positive_examples: This is an example of acetylcholine.
We observed acetylcholine in this context.
A typical case of acetylcholine would involve these features.
The concept of acetylcholine applies here.
A neurotransmitter that plays crucial roles in muscle activation, attention, arousal, and memory formation.
negative_examples: This is an example of dopamine, not acetylcholine.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Dopamine, or other types of Neurotransmitter

definition: A neurotransmitter essential for muscle activation and cognitive functions.
